sentences.sContent: Some young people suddenly become self-conscious and tongue-tied in early adolescence.
sentences.sCn: 一些年青人在青春期早期突然变得害羞结舌。

remMethod.val: ado(看做adult， 成年人) + lescence(看做licence， 许可证) → 青少年即将拿到成年的许可证 → 青春(期)

words.tran: 进入青春期；如青春期少年般行事

trans.tranOther: the time, usually between the ages of 12 and 18, when a young person is developing into an adult
